document.full_text: representatives from north and south sudan have agreed to set up a demilitarized zone along their shared border, the african union said tuesday, ten days after the north seized the disputed abyei region.
document.title: north, south sudan agree demilitarized zone: au
lines_and_colors: representatives from north and south sudan have agreed to set up a demilitarized zone along their shared border, the african union said tuesday, ten days after the north seized the disputed abyei region.
